    public abstract class ThreadedSimpleTask<PARAMETER>
extends ThreadedTask<PARAMETER,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
    Do a simple task.
    Some task just need to have a parameter a don't care about result and progression information. see ThreadedTask
    Author:
    JHelp
